document.full_text: john a. boehner, the house speaker, urged republicans to rally around jane l. corwin, whose campaign for congress suffered when her opponent made medicare a central issue.
document.title: as special house race intensifies, washington sends backup
lines_and_colors: john a. boehner, the house speaker, urged republicans to rally around jane l. corwin, whose campaign for congress suffered when her opponent made medicare a central issue.
